survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and participant satisfaction with corporate training programs to improve future training initiatives.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the corporate training programs you have attended?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the corporate training programs you have attended?

questions.question_text: Which of the following training topics have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify participation across various training topics. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following training topics have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future corporate training programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on potential improvements. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text area for free-form responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future corporate training programs?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our corporate training programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS). Ensure the scale is intuitive and mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our corporate training programs to a colleague?

questions.question_text: Which format do you prefer for corporate training sessions?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to identify preferred training formats. Useful for planning future sessions.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Which format do you prefer for corporate training sessions?
